      • anyRidesLeft

        public boolean anyRidesLeft()
        when driving a uberPool, to see if there are still some customers inside the car
        Returns:
        true if he still have to finish a ride // false if he has already finished and the car is empty of customers

      • pickingUberPoolCust

        Returns:

      • askForRide

        public boolean askForRide(java.lang.String type,
                          double coorX,
                          double coorY,
                          double price,
                          Ride ride)
        Client ask him for a ride and he has to decide if doing it or not Right now he accepts if he is available
        Parameters:
        type - Type of ride
        coorX - coordinate X of the destination
        coorY - coordinate Y of the destination
        price - price that he will earn for the ride
        ride - ride that he will have to complete
        Returns:
        true if he accepts // false if he rejects
